<S%G4183>Great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1752><s%> 'For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G1752>cause<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2641>shall<s%> <S%G2641>leave<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G4347>join<s%> <S%G1135>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2071>the<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G1519>become<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh?<s%>'

<S%G5620>So<s%> that they <S%G1526>are<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has joined <S%G4801>together,<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G5563>let<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> tear <S%G5563>apart.<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3754>them,<s%> <S%G3475>"Moses,<s%> <S%G4314>because<s%> of the hardness <S%G4641>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4641>hearts,<s%> <S%G2010>allowed<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> to <S%G630>divorce<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1135>wives,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> it <S%G1096>has<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> been <S%G3779>so.<s%>

<S%G302>I<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3754>you<s%> that <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G630>divorces<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G1487>except<s%> <S%G3361>for<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1060>marries<s%> <S%G243>another,<s%> commits <S%G3429>adultery;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he who <S%G1060>marries<s%> her when she is <S%G630>divorced<s%> commits <S%G3429>adultery.<s%>"

<S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> this is the <S%G156>case<s%> of the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3779>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> it <S%G4851>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4851>expedient<s%> to <S%G1060>marry.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3756>"Not<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men can <S%G5562>receive<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> those to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G1325>given.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3748>there<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2135>eunuchs<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1080>were<s%> <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G3779>that<s%> way <S%G1537>from<s%> their <S%G3384>mother<s%>'s <S%G2836>womb,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2135>eunuchs<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> were made <S%G2135>eunuchs<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G444>men;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2134>eunuchs<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2134>made<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G2135>eunuchs<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>Heaven<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake.<s%> He who is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5562>receive<s%> <S%G5562>it,<s%> let him receive it."

<S%G5119>Then<s%> little <S%G3813>children<s%> were <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G2007>lay<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>pray;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G863>"Allow<s%> the little <S%G3813>children,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G2967>forbid<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3165>me;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>Heaven<s%> belongs to ones like <S%G5108>these.<s%>"
He <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4198>departed<s%> from <S%G1564>there.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G18>"Good<s%> <S%G1320>teacher,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>thing<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do <S%G3004>you<s%> call <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G18>good?<s%> <S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1487>but<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> that <S%G2316>is,<s%> God. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments.<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1161>"Which<s%> <S%G2424>ones?<s%>" Jesus <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5407><s%>" 'You shall not3756 murder.5407' 3431 'You shall not3756 commit adultery.3431' 3431 'You shall not3756 steal.2813' 2813 'You shall not3756 offer false testimony.5576'

<S%G5091><s%> 'Honor <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother.<s%>' <S%G2532>And,<s%> <S%G25><s%> 'You shall love <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>'"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G191>when<s%> the young <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3056>saying,<s%> he went <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3076>sad,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2258>he<s%> was one who <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G2933>possessions.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "Most <S%G281>certainly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>a<s%> rich <S%G4145>man<s%> <S%G1525>will<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>Heaven<s%> <S%G1525>with<s%> <S%G1423>difficulty.<s%>

<S%G3825>Again<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2123>easier<s%> <S%G1330>for<s%> a <S%G2574>camel<s%> to <S%G1330>go<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G4476>needle<s%>'s <S%G5169>eye,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G1525>for<s%> a rich <S%G4145>man<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1605>it,<s%> they were <S%G4970>exceedingly<s%> <S%G1605>astonished,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G687>then<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved?<s%>"

<S%G1689>Looking<s%> at <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3844>"With<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G102>impossible,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G1415>possible.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>everything,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G4671>you.<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G687>then<s%> <S%G2071>will<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2071>have?<s%>"

<S%G3956>Everyone<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3614>houses,<s%> or <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G79>sisters,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G68>lands,<s%> <S%G1752>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>'s <S%G1752>sake,<s%> will <S%G2983>receive<s%> one <S%G1542>hundred<s%> <S%G2532>times,<s%> and will <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> will be <S%G2078>last<s%> who <S%G2071>are<s%> <S%G4413>first;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> who are <S%G2078>last.<s%>"
